entry.title: Ubuntu下安装Docker
entry.content:
Ubnutu 下安装Docker

具体步骤

  • 官方文档: https://docs.docker.com/desktop/install/ubuntu/
  • 终端执行步骤：
    1、arch  #查看系统内核2、lsb_release -a  #查看系统2.1、curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg  #载Docker的GPG密钥2.2、echo "deb [arch=x86_64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable edge test" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null3、sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=x86_64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable edge test"  #根据系统内核修改[arch=XXXX]4、sudo apt-get remove docker docker-engine docker.io containerd runc  #卸载老版本docker5、sudo apt-get update  #更新apt源6、sudo apt-get install \        ca-certificates \    curl \    gnupg \    lsb-release    #安装4个包7、curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg   #添加软件源的 GPG 密钥8、echo \    "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \    $(lsb_release -cs) stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null    #向 sources.list 中添加 Docker 软件源9、sudo apt-get update  #更新apt10、sudo apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io   #安装docker-ce11、docker --version   #安装成功，查看docker版本12、sudo docker run hello-world   #验证安装成功与否，docker.com下载镜像，然后运行
